short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple text box to store information in a way you'd prefer, or a simple list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have something you can't afford to forget? 

Organize your day-to-day goals with this efficient, accessible text box. 

Simply write your to-do's in the text box, click a button, and have an organized list at your disposal.
